item.title: About me
item.description: I’m a Cologne/Bonn-based freelance software-engineer with tons of backend and a fair amount of frontend experience. In the past years I’ve worked mainly in the online-payment sector for international companies. Skills German (native) / English (like an IT guy) Finisher Team player Secure coding Building frameworks, APIs, generic code and keeping things simple I like scrum My tech-stack Modern Java (10+ years) Spring/-boot/-data/-security/etc (10+ years) SQL (20+ years) Docker Concourse CI Modern JavaScript (the good parts) (4+ years) React Web EmberJS (3+ years) GWT (3+ years) iOS/Objectiv-C (2+ years) C/C++/Delphi/Basic/Assembler in past life I have absolutely no knowledge of PHP References I’ve worked in projects for Aixigo, BMW, ClickandBuy, Draeger, Ford, PayCo, PayU, Trimplement, Vaillant, some banks and insurance companies.
